long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sniper Gun is an exhilarating first-person shooter game that puts players in the shoes of elite snipers tasked with carrying out high-stakes missions across various environments. In this game, precision, stealth, and strategy are the keys to success as players navigate through challenging scenarios to eliminate targets with pinpoint accuracy.

The game features stunning graphics that immerse players in realistic and immersive environments, ranging from dense urban landscapes to remote wilderness settings. Each environment presents unique challenges and opportunities, requiring players to adapt their tactics accordingly.
